Articles.Content:
so i'm reviving a mod right now and i've run into something. The game instantly just shuts down when loading into a save would someone please volunteer to look at the log and help me out?

log

Edited December 8, 2022 by charz185
made the post more accurate to me just finding the error!
solved, I redid my code all over, now it works. sorry for posting this question. The answer to the problem was specific to the mod im reviving, and was not a error for the game.
